Package ai.harmony.ravel.analysis

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TriConsumer<A,B,C>
    A BiConsumer with 3 arguments.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FieldTag
    A field tag is a tag applied to a variable meaning that either 1) the variable was set by reading a field of a record tagged with a model tag matching the given model and creator 2) the variable was the sink of a instruction whose source was a variable of type 1) This is the global (meaning interprocedural/after we computed ownership information) version of LocalOwnershipTaggingPass.FieldTag.
    FlowAnalysis
    Compute flows between different spaces Created by gcampagn on 1/31/17.
    LocalModelOperationAnalysis
    The local (single function) version of ModelOperationAnalysis Created by gcampagn on 2/13/17.
    LocalOwnershipTaggingPass
    "Tags" each variable/register in the IR with a set of model fields that influence its value, and the creator (self or arrived) of that model Created by gcampagn on 2/9/17.
    LocalOwnershipTaggingPass.LocalFieldTag  
    LocalOwnershipTaggingPass.LocalModelTag
    A model tag is a tag applied to a variable meaning that either 1) the variable is a record of the given model created by the given creator 2) the variable is a context holding a record of the given model created by the given creator 3) the variable was extracted from a field of a variable of type 1) 4) the variable was computed from arithmetic operations
    ModelOperationAnalysis
    Compute which instantiated controller does what on each field of each model, based on the instructions on the event handlers Created by gcampagn on 2/9/17.
    ModelOwnershipAnalysis
    For each event handler, compute which variables have values coming from a model field, which fields the values come from, and who creates the corresponding records.
    ModelTag
    A model tag is a tag applied to a variable meaning that either 1) the variable is a record of the given model created by the given creator 2) the variable is a context holding a record of the given model created by the given creator 3) the variable was extracted from a field or an array of a variable of type 1) 4) the variable is a record or array whose field or element was set by value of type 1), 2) or 3) 4) the variable was computed from arithmetic operations from variables of any of the previous types This is the global (meaning interprocedural/after we computed ownership information) version of LocalOwnershipTaggingPass.ModelTag.
    ModelWritingAnalysis
    Find all the controllers that write to a model (in the sense that they call .save() on that model) Created by gcampagn on 2/10/17.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LocalOwnershipTaggingPass.Creator
    The creator of a record
    Operation
    An abstraction over what a controller can do to a model field.
